// NetworkPredictionOptions

0 (NetworkPredictionAlways)   = Predict network actions on any network connection
1 (NetworkPredictionWifiOnly) = Not supported, will be treated the same as 0
2 (NetworkPredictionNever)    = Don't predict network actions on any network connection


// DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting
// DefaultWebHidGuardSetting
// DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting

2 = Do not allow any site to request access
3 = Allow sites to ask the user to grant access


The url below has details on more settings, albeit some are only for the Edge browser.

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-policies
